member.param: The Azure IoT name fully qualified (ex: youriothub.azure-devices.net).
The device ID which is the name of your device.
The module ID which is attached to the device ID.
One of the SAS Key either primary, either secondary.
The default quality level delivery for the MQTT messages, default to the lower quality.
Azure certificate for the connection to Azure IoT Hub.
Azure Plug and Play model ID.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Client.DeviceClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,nanoFramework.M2Mqtt.Messages.MqttQoSLevel,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate,System.String)
member.param: The Azure IoT name fully qualified (ex: youriothub.azure-devices.net).
The device ID which is the name of your device.
One of the SAS Key either primary, either secondary.
The default quality level delivery for the MQTT messages, default to the lower quality.
Azure certificate for the connection to Azure IoT Hub.
Azure Plug and Play model ID.

members.member:
Creates an class.
Your Azure IoT Hub fully qualified domain name (example: youriothub.azure-devices.net). The device ID (name of your device). The certificate to connect the device (containing both public and private keys). Pass null if you are using the certificate store on the device. The default quality of assurance level for delivery for the MQTT messages (defaults to the lowest quality). /// Azure certificate for the connection to Azure IoT Hub. /// Azure Plug and Play model ID.

member.summary: Additional (optional) Json Data to be sent to the service

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Unassigned
member.summary: Device has not yet come on-line

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Assigning
member.summary: Device has connected to the DRS but IoT Hub Id has not yet been returned to the device

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Assigned
member.summary: DRS successfully returned a device Id and connection string to the device

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType.InitialAssignment
member.summary: Device has been assigned to an IoT hub for the first time

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType.DeviceDataMigrated
member.summary: Device has been assigned to a different IoT hub and its device data was migrated from the previously assigned IoT hub. Device data was removed from the previously assigned IoT hub.

member.name: F:nanoFramework.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType.DeviceDataReset
member.summary: Device has been assigned to a different IoT hub and its device data was populated from the initial state stored in the enrollment. Device data was removed from the previously assigned IoT hub.
